oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Souvenir badge of the dedication of Chickamauga-Chattanooga Military Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This badge was worn by Pvt. Jacob Jay Vandergriff Co. A, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA at the dedication of Chickamauga-Chattanooga Military Park in 1889. These badges were given as souvenirs to Union and Confederate veterans who attended the joint reunion of the Grand Army of the Republic and the United Confederate Veterans. Vandergriff was from Marion County, Tennessee.
